CustomField.description: Muestra el enlace segun el origen
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(AV_OrigenAct__c , "AV_Muro"),HYPERLINK("https://l.tf7.lacaixa.es/TF7WebUtilities/redirect/peaRedirect.tf7?pea=CA.OFI.MuroConMiGestorMensajes.muro&origen=salesforce&_vmcNewTab=true&params=idCliente%3D"+ AV_AccountId__r.AV_NumPerso__c+"%26nombre%3D"+AV_AccountId__r.FirstName+"%20"+AV_AccountId__r.LastName+"%26nif%3D"+ AV_AccountId__r.CC_Numero_Documento__c ,AV_Subject__c ,'_parent'), IF(ISPICKVAL(AV_OrigenAct__c , "AV_Llamadas"),HYPERLINK("https://l.tf7.lacaixa.es/TF7WebUtilities/redirect/peaRedirect.tf7?pea=CA.OFI.CallmeGesLlamadas.detalleLlamada&origen=salesforce&_vmcNewTab=true&params=idFilenet%3D"+ AV_ExternalId__c, AV_Subject__c,'_parent'), IF(ISPICKVAL(AV_OrigenAct__c , "AV_R2B"), AV_Subject__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(AV_OrigenAct__c , "CIBE_OperacionesPendientesFirma"), AV_Subject__c, null))))
CustomField.label: Enlace TF9
